New Records: Christian Eriksen made his 132nd international appearance for Denmark, setting a milestone
Key Match Events: England scored first through Harry Kane, but Denmark equalized with Morten Hjulmand's goal
Foden hit the post but failed to capitalize on chances
Denmark's strong finish included attempts by Rasmus Hojlund and Mikkel Damsgaard
Pre-Game Insights: England entered the match as favorites but struggled to maintain control
Southgate's team selection and tactics were questioned post-match
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate faced criticism for England's performance and substitutions
The result leaves England's qualification hopes in doubt
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a challenging pitch with unpredictable bounce
Substitutions, including the removal of key players, were a notable aspect
